thread.title: Dodgers’ Don Mattingly was better than his detractors think
thread.title_full: Dodgers’ Don Mattingly was better than his detractors think - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Henry Schulman
title: Dodgers’ Don Mattingly was better than his detractors think
text:
Photo: Kevin C. Cox Someday, perhaps, Don Mattingly will raise his arms not in frustration, but to hold a World Series trophy. Someday, perhaps, Don Mattingly will raise his arms not in...
Some of the Giants’ faithful are in mourning over Don Mattingly’s departure as the Dodgers’ manager, which was couched by both Mattingly and L.A. management Thursday as a mutual parting of the ways. Someday, perhaps, Don Mattingly will raise his arms not in frustration, but to hold a World Series trophy. Someday, perhaps, Don Mattingly will raise his arms not in...
Some of the Giants’ faithful are in mourning over Don Mattingly’s departure as the Dodgers’ manager, which was couched by both Mattingly and L.A. management Thursday as a mutual parting of the ways.
